alert.note: Alert for Covington; Jefferson Davis; Simpson; Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 14 at 8:01AM CST until December 14 at 8:45AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 AM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN SIMPSON...SOUTHWESTERN SMITH...NORTHWESTERN COVINGTON AND NORTH CENTRAL JEFFERSON DAVIS COUNTIES... At 801 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Clem, or 8 miles south of Magee, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Magee around 810 AM CST. Mount Olive around 815 AM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Mize. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
